column4: hey anybody: im running breezy badger rc, can i just keep updating it and not have to install the final release?
if you do a dist-upgrade after the release-date you'll have official anyway
how can i remove old kernekl entries in grub then
removing the kernel should remove them...
you likely still have them installed
windows manager maybe. i dont know.
also the menus in gnome have old kde look theme maybe. yes gnome
sounds very odd; how did you install kde?
and, have you changed the window managers or something?
well, compile a bug report; you shouldn't really get that behaviour anyhow
probably i should stay with one desktop anyway or ill never get any work done
as I said, you shouldn't get that behaviour anyway. I have both installed in perfect harmony here
how do you solve the problem when switching to other desktop, icon image or name missing.
